name: Alpha ZV-E1 – Full-frame Interchangeable Lens Mirrorless Vlog Camera

specs.Recording Format: JPEG (DCF Ver. 2.0, Exif Ver. 2.32, MPF Baseline compliant), HEIF (MPEG-A MIAF compliant), RAW (Sony ARW 4.0 format compliant)

specs.Video Compression:
XAVC S: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264,
XAVC HS: MPEG-H HEVC/H.265

specs.Audio Recording Format: LPCM 2ch (48 kHz 16 bit), LPCM 2ch (48 kHz 24 bit), LPCM 4ch (48 kHz 24 bit) *[When using accessories that support 4ch output / 24 bits with the Multi Interface Shoe.]

specs.Recording Format: JPEG (DCF Ver. 2.0, Exif Ver. 2.32, MPF Baseline compliant), HEIF (MPEG-A MIAF compliant), RAW (Sony ARW 4.0 format compliant)

specs.Video Compression:
XAVC S: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264,
XAVC HS: MPEG-H HEVC/H.265

specs.Audio Recording Format: LPCM 2ch (48 kHz 16 bit), LPCM 2ch (48 kHz 24 bit), LPCM 4ch (48 kHz 24 bit) *[When using accessories that support 4ch output / 24 bits with the Multi Interface Shoe.]

specs.1920 x 1080 (4:2:0, 8bit) (Approx.):
119.88p (100Mbps / 60Mbps),
100p (100 Mbps / 60 Mbps),
59.94p (50Mbps / 25Mbps),
50p (50 Mbps / 25 Mbps),
29.97p (50Mbps / 16Mbps),
25p (50 Mbps / 16 Mbps),
23.98p (50Mbps)

specs.Memory Card Slot: Slot for SD (UHS-I/II compliant) memory card

specs.type: Fast Hybrid AF (phase-detection AF / contrast-detection AF)

specs.FOCUS POINT:
Still images: Max. 759 points (phase-detection AF),
Movies: Max. 627 points (phase-detection AF)

specs.Other Features:
AF Track Sens. (Still),
AF Subj. Shift Sensitivity (Movie),
AF Transition Speed (Movie),
Switch V/H AF Area,
AF Area Regist.,
Circ. of Focus Point,
Focus Map (Movie),
AF Assist (Movie)

specs.Focus Sensitivity Range: EV-6 to EV20 (ISO100 equivalent with F2.0 lens attached)

specs.Recognition Target (Still images):
Human,
Animal,
Bird,
Insect,
Car,
Train,
Airplane

specs.Recognition Target (Movies):
Human,
Animal,
Bird,
Insect,
Car,
Train,
Airplane

specs.METERING SENSITIVITY: EV-3 to EV20 (ISO100 equivalent with F2.0 lens attached)

specs.ISO Sensitivity (Recommended Exposure In:
Still images: ISO 80 - 102400 (expandable to ISO 40 - 409600), AUTO (ISO 80 - 12800, selectable lower limit and upper limit),
Movies: ISO 80 - 102400 equivalent (expandable to ISO 80 - 409600), AUTO (ISO 80 - 12800, selectable lower limit and upper limit)

specs.Adjustable Angle:
Opening Angle: Approx. 176 °, 
Rotation Angle: Approx. 270 °

specs.SHUTTER SPEED:
Still images: 1/8000 to 30 s,
Movies: 1/8000 to 1 s

specs.type: Image sensor-shift mechanism with 5-axis compensation (compensation depends on lens specifications)

specs.COMPENSATION EFFECT (STILL IMAGES): 5.0 stops (based on CIPA standard. Pitch/yaw shake only. With FE 50mm F1.2 GM lens mounted.)

specs.Mode:
Still images: On / Off,
Movie: Dynamic active / Active / Standard / Off

specs.External Flash Compatibility: Sony α System Flash compatible with Multi Interface Shoe, attach the shoe adaptor for flash compatible with Auto-lock accessory shoe

specs.VIDEO DATA FORMAT:
MJPEG,
YUV420 *[When [Resolution] is set to [HD(720p)], [MJPEG] is only available.]

specs.No. of frame recordable (approx.)\u00a0*:
JPEG Extra fine L: over 1000 frames,
JPEG Fine L: over 1000 frames,
JPEG Standard L: over 1000 frames,
RAW: over 1000 frames,
RAW & JPG: 416 frames,
RAW (Lossless Compressed): over 1000 frames,
RAW (Lossless Compressed) & JPEG: 92 frames,
RAW (Uncompressed): 85 frames,
RAW (Uncompressed) & JPG: 57 frames

specs.Dimensions (W x H x D): Approx. 121.0 x 71.9 x 54.3 mm (FROM GRIP TO MONITOR)

specs.Dimensions (W x H x D) (in.): Approx. 4 7/8 x 2 7/8 x 2 1/4 inches (FROM GRIP TO MONITOR)

specs.Clear Image Zoom:
Still images: Approx. 2x,
Movies: Approx. 1.5x (4K), Approx. 2x (HD)

specs.type: 35mm full frame (35.6 x 23.8 mm), Exmor R CMOS sensor

specs.Number of Pixels (effective)\u00a0*[Numb:
Still images: Approx. 12.1 megapixels max.
Movies: Approx. 10.1 megapixels max. *[When "SteadyShot" is set to "Standard" or "Off".]

specs.HD Output:
HDMI micro connector (Type-D),
HDMI connector: 3840 x 2160 (59.94p / 50p / 29.97p / 25p / 23.98p) / 1920 x 1080 (59.94p / 50p / 23.98p) / 1920 x 1080 (59.94i / 50i), YCbCr 4:2:2 10bit / RGB 8bit

specs.Wireless LAN (Built-In): Yes (Wi-Fi Compatible, IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (2.4 GHz band/5 GHz band)) *[(Configuration method/Access method) WPS or manually /infrastructure mode. When connecting to smartphones, the camera can always work as a base without a wireless access point. (Security: WEP/WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK/WPA3-SAE)] *[Models sold in some countries/regions support IEEE 802.11b/g/n (2.4GHz) wireless LAN only.]

specs.Functions:
Send to smartphone,
Remote control via smartphone,
PC Remote

specs.Modes:
Enlarged display mode,
Protect,
Rating,
Shot Mark (Movie),
Divider Frame,
Crop,
Photo Capture

specs.Power consumption with LCD screen:
Still images: Approx. 3.5 W (with FE 28-60mm F4-5.6 lens attached),
Movies: Approx. 7.0 W (with FE 28-60mm F4-5.6 lens attached)

specs.USB Power Supply: Yes (Available with USB Type-C Terminal. USB Power Delivery compatible)

specs.Internal Battery Charge: Yes (Available with USB Type-C Terminal. USB Power Delivery compatible)

Screen Reader,
Focus Magnifier,
Focus Map (Movie),
Peaking Display,
Subject Recognition in AF,
Touch Focus,
Touch Tracking,
Touch Shutter,
Touch AE,
Vari-angle LCD screen,
Custom function
